servinfo.title: Self-Diagnosis Description
servinfo.ptxt: ABS control module diagnoses conditions of the system component parts (whether or not there is any abnormality) all the time and indicates the results (warning of abnormality occurrence and DTC) through the ABS warning light (1) as described.

item.ptxt: When ignition switch is turned ON, ABS warning light lights for 2 seconds to check its circuit.
When no abnormality has been detected (the system is in good condition), ABS warning light turns OFF after 2 seconds.
When an abnormality in the system is detected, ABS warning light lights and the area where that abnormality lies is stored in the memory of EEPROM in ABS control module.
